page.title: 03Bryanston School
page.content:
Founded in 1928,the School has 600 pupils(420 boys/180 girls)& 60 staff teaching.It is a 13-18 boarding school & charges fees of @Â£1900 a term.
{ 4 July: sample of activities} {Pupil aged 14} Humanities,Geography, Art,Chemistry,Violin,Swimming,Exam work,Tennis. {Pupil aged 15} History,Humanities, German,Chemistry,Dressmaking,Tennis {Pupil aged 16 }Revised for final GCE O level exams(2 left / 8 sat),reading, Athletics match, listening to music. {Pupil aged 17} Art History, European History,Pottery,Italian, revision for English exam, in Careers Room (courses at universities),Woodwork, Orchestra practice. {Head of History} Took 35 pupils to the Imperial War Museum, London, for day. Writing reports,marking,setting exams.
